---

title: "Facebook Announces TransCoder AI to Translate Code across Programming Languages"
excerpt: "Facebook AI Research has announced TransCoder, a system that uses unsupervised deep-learning to convert code from one programming language to another. TransCoder was trained on more than 2.8 million open source projects and outperforms existing code translation systems that use rule-based methods."
